title: "Edmunds sets stage for AI with data infrastructure consolidation"
excerpt: "Edmunds, an online resource for automotive inventory and information, has been struggling to consolidate its data infrastructure. Now, with the infrastructure side of its data house in order, the California-based company is envisioning a bold new future with AI and machine learning (ML) at its core."
